title: Fabulous 3BD/1.5BTH House for rent
description: Fabulous home in one of the most desired neighborhoods in Montgomery county. Walk up to a beautifully lush front yard with a welcoming, spacious front porch. Enter into the main floor living room with sparkling hardwood floors, plenty of natural sunlight and a wood-burning brick fireplace. Continue through the open floor plan into the dining room with a picture window and unique light fixture open to the newly renovated kitchen. The kitchen has gorgeous cabinetry, a new countertop and custom built-in pantry wall cabinets. On the main floor, you will also find 3 bedrooms, each with ceiling fans and ample closets. The main floor full bath has a tub/shower combo and built-in storage. From the kitchen you can exit into the spacious, back yard with an attached deck and flagstone patio. Or you can head down to the basement where you will find a newly installed half bath and a large, well-lit laundry room. The remainder of the basement has plenty of room for storage or extra play room. The property has a single car width driveway that can fit 2 cars easily and custom wrought iron gates into the back yard. The best part of the property is the neighborhood. You would be less than a 300 foot walk to the center of Keswick Village where you will find a well stocked grocer (O'Neill's), a diner, several pubs and restaurants, and the one-of-a-kind Keswick Theater. You are a 10 minute walk to the Glenside SEPTA train station served by the Airport Line, Doylestown/Warminster, and West Trenton lines and steps from a Bus Line 22 stop.

title: WELCOME HOME!
description: Your fully renovated, spacious  twin in the middle of the hustle and bustle of Northeast  Philadelphia, near all major routes, shopping and multiple dining options is waiting for its lucky new resident.  As you enter the home, you are pleasantly surprised by the  sheer size of the  living room, clad in hardwood,  sporting vaulted ceilings and a huge bay window.  The floorplan then opens to a dining area and a solid, mahogany eat in kitchen, topped with soapstone and complete with a skylight installed this year, followed by  3 ample, sunlit bedrooms  and 2 full renovated baths. As you descend one set of   stairs, you enter the walk-out, windowed lower floor where  hardwood continues to define the massive  space. This could be your theatre, exercise room,  bar area, a studio  apartment for a grown child or and  in-law suite, complete with a full bath.  A wall  of storage  closets solves  any storage problems you may have thought you had. The laundry is also located downstairs, as is the garage. All of the exterior and interior doors are new, including the garage door.  The kitchen and bathrooms have been redone in the last several years. The roof is 10 years old, with a warranty of 5 years remaining  for the new buyer and is transferrable. The hot water heater is  5 years old. The kitchen skylight is brand new and has a 10 year warranty.  All of the windows are also recent. This home is spacious  enough to accommodate an extended or blended family and yet close to enough to everything the Northeast has to offer.

The primary bedroom is complete with built-in storage next to the ensuite bath and a unique cutout by the window, perfect for plants. Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.

Perfectly positioned just steps away from Rosys Taco Bar, Alchemy Coffee, and Jj's Thai Cuisine, you'll never be short on dining options. Plus, with easy access to Trader Joe's, UPenn, Drexel, 30th Street Station, and Center City, this location is ideal for those seeking convenience and accessibility.
Convenient coin-operated laundry facilities are available on-site for shared use within the building. Nearby monthly parking available for $225/month (at the Walnut Street Bridge).

title: Renovated 1 bedroom available now at 4122 Haverford ave!
description:
Blending relaxation and sophistication to create the ideal place, 4122 Haverford offers one-bedroom luxury apartments located in an affordable up-and-coming district just north of University City, adjacent to the Drexel University athletic field complex. This 10-unit building located in West Powelton has 8 apartments on the Haverford Avenue side and 2 apartments on the Brandywine Street side, with the Brandywine apartments (units 9 & 10) including 2-car parking each. Stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and garbage disposal, a multi-camera security system, intercom system with remote door buzzer, code access, linen closet, hardwood floors, in-unit laundry, granite counters, kitchen pantry, contemporary tile flooring in bathrooms, separate heat/air in bedroom and living areas, sprinkler system, extra tenant storage space in building, LED lighting, large windows and large closets are just some of the great amenities this property has to offer! Close proximity to University City and downtown Philadelphia gives you immediate access to the downtown area without paying downtown prices!
